remarks: Write a group sum over a cartesian product as a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumxp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumxp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumxp.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumxp.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumxp.r $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
gsumxp.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A X. C ) --> B ) $.
gsumxp.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumxp $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( j e. A |-> ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> ( j F k ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. j k $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d C j k $.
$d F j k $.
$d G j k $.
$d V j $.
$d j k ph $.
